articles.description: Offshore wind has a long history of being right around the corner in the U.S. At the risk of repeating history, this might finally be the moment the U.S. starts to get offshore wind right. And Biden’s new target—while a huge leap—is absolutely a possibility.
articles.content: If President Joe Biden has his way, the U.S. is about to go all in on offshore wind power. His administration announced on Monday that it was setting a goal of getting 30 gigawatts of electricity fro… [+6536 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Friedman
articles.title: U.S. Home Prices Rise at Fastest Pace in 15 Years - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller index increased 11.2% in year ended in January, highest rise since February 2006
articles.content:
U.S. home prices are rising at the fastest pace in 15 years, reflecting how fiercely buyers are competing for a limited supply of homes in nearly every corner of the country.
